question: Are there any free online courses available for students?
answer:
Yes, there are several free online courses available temporarily. Here are some of them: 
1. *Complete Arduino Course For Beginners* - https://www.udemy.com/full-arduino-course-for-beginners/?couponCode=7AUG2023_5DS_1000ST 
2. *Complete Data Science BootCamp* - https://www.udemy.com/course/complete-data-science-bootcamp/?ranMID=39197&ranEAID=ymZi*S07GWE&ranSiteID=ymZi.S07GWE-IoLxI0G_OkBc4CF201epLQ&LSNPUBID=ymZi*S07GWE&utm_source=aff-campaign&utm_medium=udemyads&couponCode=2069F4845403D540FE6A 
3. *The Ultimate C++ Beginner Course* - https://www.udemy.com/course/the-ultimate-c-beginner-course/?couponCode=4625C7E68CD807E2DF13 
4. *The Ultimate C++ Advanced Course* - https://www.udemy.com/the-ultimate-c-advanced-course-2022/?couponCode=8E00BF2EACAE45EE2957 
5. *HTML and CSS: Introduction to Web Development & Coding* - https://www.udemy.com/html-and-css-introduction-to-web-development/?couponCode=A52B1D4198D7DE0C1BDB 
6. *Fast Python Programming For Absolute Beginners SQL in Python* - https://www.udemy.com/easy-python-programming-for-absolute-beginners-sql-in-python/?couponCode=AUG_FREE_31 
7. *Computer Networks Fundamentals* - https://www.udemy.com/computer-networks-fundamentals/?couponCode=AUG2023 
8. *IP Addressing and Subnetting - Zero to Hero* - https://www.udemy.com/ip-addressing-zero-to-hero/?couponCode=AUG2023 
9. *Information Security Fundamentals* - https://www.udemy.com/infosec-fundamentals/?couponCode=AUG2023 
10. *Practical Cisco Networking Labs in Cisco Packet Tracer* - https://www.udemy.com/course/practical-cisco-networking-labs/?ranMID=39197&ranEAID=ymZi*S07GWE&ranSiteID=ymZi.S07GWE-YdgUuUTkgvuuiTR.rNM45A&LSNPUBID=ymZi*S07GWE&utm_source=aff-campaign&utm_medium=udemyads&couponCode=AUG2023 
11. *Complete Linux Training* - https://www.udemy.com/linux-full-course-and-some-tips-for-smart-linux-learning/?couponCode=FREE-HAPPY-RATE 
12. *Complete Python & Python OOP* - https://www.udemy.com/python-oop-master-python-oop-from-scratch-with-projects/?couponCode=52CD4C520EB79FFC9F7A

question: Are there any internship opportunities for Biomedical Engineering students?
answer:
Yes, KPJ Healthcare HQ is currently looking for 2 interns for the Medical Technology division under Group Procurement. It is a PAID internship. The job scope includes: 
1. Assist in technical evaluations 
2. Purchasing management 
3. Documentations 
Location: Menara KPJ, KL 
If interested, they can contact +601127252856 (Lisa). Graduates are NOT eligible for this internship.
